sourcesContent:
import { gql } from "apollo-server-express"

export default gql`
  type User {
      id: String!
      firstName: String!
      lastName: String
      username: String!
      email: String!
      createdAt: String!
      updatedAt: String!
      bio: String
      avatar: String
      following: [User]
      followers: [User]
      totalFollowing: Int!
      totalFollowers: Int!
      isFollowing: Boolean!
      isMe: Boolean!
  }
`;
